00045 
00046 Entree& Schema_Euler_Implicite::readOn(Entree& s)
00047 {
00048   nb_ite_max=200;
00049   residu_old_=0;
00050   facsec_max_=DMAXFLOAT;
00051   thermique_monolithique_ = 0;
00052   Schema_Implicite_base::readOn(s);
00053   if (facsec_max_ == DMAXFLOAT) /* facsec_max non regle par l'utilisateur -> on demande sa preference au solveur */
00054     facsec_max_ = le_solveur->get_default_facsec_max();
00055   dt_gf_ = le_solveur->get_default_growth_factor();
00056   if(!le_solveur.non_nul())
00057     {
00058       Cerr << "A solver must be selected." << finl;
00059       Cerr << "Syntax : " << finl
00060            << "Solveur solver_name [ solver parameters ] " << finl;
00061       exit();
00062     }
00063   if (thermique_monolithique_ && !le_solveur->est_compatible_avec_th_mono())
00064     Cerr << que_suis_je() << " : deactivating thermique_monolithique for the implicit solver " << le_solveur->que_suis_je() << finl, thermique_monolithique_ = 0;
00065   if (diffusion_implicite())
00066     {
00067       Cerr << "diffusion_implicite option cannot be used with an implicit time scheme." << finl;
00068       exit();
00069     }
00070   return s;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void calcul_fac_sec(double& residu_,double& residu_old,double& facsec_,const double& facsec_max_,int& nb_ite_sans_accel_)
00074 {
00075   double rap=1.2;
00076   int nb_ite_sans_accel_max=10;
00077   nb_ite_sans_accel_max=20000;
00078 
00079   if (residu_old==0)
00080     {
00081       residu_old=residu_;
00082       nb_ite_sans_accel_=0;
00083     }
00084   else if ((residu_old>rap*residu_)||(nb_ite_sans_accel_>nb_ite_sans_accel_max))
00085     {
00086       facsec_*=sqrt(rap);
00087       residu_old=residu_;
00088       facsec_=min(facsec_,facsec_max_);
00089       nb_ite_sans_accel_=0;
00090     }
00091   nb_ite_sans_accel_++;
00092   /*
00093     else if (residu_>residu_old*rap)
00094     {
00095     facsec_/=sqrt(rap);
00096     residu_old=residu_;
00097     facsec_=min(facsec_,facsec_max_);
00098     }
00099   */
00100 // Process::Journal()<<" residu" <<residu_<<" "<<residu_old<<" "<<facsec_<<finl;
00101 // if (residu_old!=0) facsec_=facsec_*residu_old/eps;
00102 // 
00103 }

00105 void Schema_Euler_Implicite::set_param(Param& param)
00106 {
00107 // XD schema_euler_implicite schema_implicite_base schema_euler_implicite -1 This is the Euler implicit scheme.
00108   param.ajouter("max_iter_implicite",&nb_ite_max);
